column5: This top floor corner unit is a quiet place to unwind and enjoy your vacation. The balcony is protected from the afternoon sun while offering great views that overlook its private boat slip. The living room is decorated with a stylish nautical theme and has a large TV with DVD. Master has a king bed with private bath and large walk-in closet. Master bedroom also has a 26\
column8: COMPASS CONDOMINIUM, A13 3 BD, 2 BTH, WATERFRONT
